meanings.definition: The protrusion of an organ or tissue through an abnormal opening.
meanings.sent1: The herniation of the disc caused back pain.
meanings.sent2: Doctors diagnosed the herniation after the MRI scan.
meanings.sent3: The herniation of the balloon made it pop unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The herniation of the wall allowed light to seep through the crack.
meanings.sent5: The herniation of the dough in the oven created a lopsided loaf.

meanings.definition: The act of herniating or becoming herniated.
meanings.sent1: Her sudden herniation during the game surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The herniation of the muscle was painful.
meanings.sent3: The herniation of the tire made the car wobble comically.
meanings.sent4: The herniation of the clouds signaled an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The herniation of the balloon was visible as it slowly deflated.
